name: Shadow Bathing
description:
You are Eskil End, an agent working behind enemy lines to collect top secret information. To avoid capture you have to stay in the dark, but watch your step! The dark conceals more than yourself, it hides everything around you! You'll have to traverse the maps in this 2D-game without seeing anything. You do, however, have access to gadgets that will help you with that, such as glowsticks and a pair of nightvision goggles. Oh, and also! Watch out for the guards and the searchlight looking for you!

Supports: Keyboard + Gamepad
Recommended: Gamepad
